name: Dr. Amit Verma
summary: PhD (CSE), M.Tech (CSE), and B.Tech (CSE) with over 19 years of experience in teaching and research. Currently serving as an Assistant Professor in the Computer Science & Engineering Department at Maharaja Agrasen University, Baddi.
current_responsibilities: Coordinator of NAAC Criteria-3 of the Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology.
Department Coordinator of CSE, BCA & MCA Departments.
Performed as Centre Superintendent in Mid Semester Tests and End Term Examinations of Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology.
Overall Time Table In-charge of Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology.
Performed as Faculty Coordinator of IDE Boot Camp held from 28/5/2024 to 2/6/2024 at Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology.
